a9e7b409-5837-4fd4-97e2-a9e745ed473e.response:
Hello <PERSON>,
It's great to hear that you're enjoying your meadow! As the season changes, it's normal for plants to start leaning and looking a bit tired. You can certainly cut back any plants that are falling over or looking unsightly. If it's too dense to mow, using a weed whacker or shears would work just fine. Just be sure to leave about 6 inches of growth so the plants can properly prepare for <DATE_TIME>.
Please let us know if we can be of further assistance and thank you for sharing these wonderful photos with us.
Kind regards,

Customer's Message: Thanks, it worked.
Agent's Message: Hi Lafayette,
Thank you for reaching out, and we're sorry to hear about the charging issue with your watch.
To troubleshoot and resolve the problem, please try the following steps:
Check Charging Cable:
Ensure that the charging cable is securely connected to both the watch and the power source.
Inspect the cable for any damage, and if possible, try an alternate charging cable to rule out a faulty cable.
Power Source:
Try charging your watch from a different power source, such as a different USB port or an alternate charger.
Restart Your Watch:
Perform a restart on your watch. This can sometimes resolve minor issues.
Clean Charging Ports:
Inspect the charging ports on both the watch and the cable for any dirt or debris. Gently clean them using a soft, dry brush or compressed air.
If the issue persists after trying these steps, please let me know. Thanks again!

human_message: Hi

ai_message: Hi <PERSON> sorry to hear the Atom Pro 2 did not meet your needs and I want to thank you for your patience so far. Please give me the opportunity to make things right for you.
We do have our <URL> which will specifically address the exact issues you had with the Atom Pro 2. I think if we upgrade you to the BTE it will be perfect for you.
I understand that you might not be open to a behind the ear device, and a lot of our customers said the same thing at first, but after trying the Audien BTE they found that it actually worked better for them than in-ear devices.
The main challenges users face with the Atom Pro 2 are solved by the BTE:
Size/fit - If the Atom Pro 2 didn't fit comfortably in your ears, the BTE definitely will. Since only the earbud goes in your ear canal instead of the whole unit, the BTE can fit into ears as small as a child's.Feedback - While the Atom Pro 2 has great sound quality, it can still have some feedback because the microphone sits in your ear canal. With the BTE, this problem is solved because the microphone is on the device which sits outside of the ear.Power & sound quality - The Audien BTE is the most powerful device we have available. If you had any problems with power or sound quality on the Atom Pro 2, the BTE will outperform it.Discretion - If you're worried about how the BTE will look, it actually is more invisible when worn compared to in-ear devices. Since it fits behind your ear, it can only be seen from behind you, but when someone is looking at your face it can't be seen.
The <PERSON> typically retails for $489, however what I can do is upgrade you from your Atom Pro 2 to the BTE for only $80.
I can also give you free shipping on your upgrade, and it will include a <DATE_TIME> money back guarantee, just in case the BTE doesn't work for you.
Let me know if you'd like to try the upgrade and I could get it shipped out to you right away!

Customer's Message: Thanks, the fan in the Hub is making the noise and it's not being caused by cable contact as far as I can see.
A replacement would be great.

Would it be possible to also get a set of the footpads? And is there a version of the Hub case thatʻs opaque like the drive case? <PERSON> consider paying for that as an upgrade.
Agent's Message: It could be as simple as a cable errantly touching the fan. Whatever issues you had initially setting it up should not persist on powering it down. First step is to determine if it is the Evergreen Hub or the drive making noise, both have a fan. Whichever one is the source, power it down and remove the four footpads on the bottom. This exposes the phillips head screws. Remove this and inspect to see if a cable is touching a fan. If not the fan might be bad and if so we can send a replacement.
Customer's Message: My starter kit spent a long time in transit and I struggled to get it setup but itʻs been working for <DATE_TIME> now.
However starting <DATE_TIME> something in the kit is making a loud humming sound. Sounds like a drive problem (or fan, not sure there are any fans).
I donʻt see any obvious problems inspecting the info thatʻs surfaced in the app.
Iʻd rather not teardown the system since itʻs working but the noise is bothersome.
What course of action would you recommend?
69d76a14-aa93-4ecd-bc96-c71cf118cdf5.response:
Hi there,

The larger fan is actually the better one. It's worth noting that instead of plugging the 2 pin cable into the old port, you'll want to affix it to the pins on the side of the device. The pins should be color-coded and you'll want to locate the pins in the corner with black and red, and plug in the 2 pins aligned to those colors. The fan should immediately turn on. If you need further assistance, please book a meeting where I can help you add it.

Best,
<PERSON>

Dear <PERSON>,

I would like to extend my sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused. It has come to our attention that our warehouse encountered production difficulties as a result of an unexpectedly high demand. I understand how frustrating it can be when a product doesn't work as expected. We do want to make sure that all of our products are in perfect condition and functioning well. <PERSON> leather is thin and stretchy and because of this, this particular cutter will not handle this material well in thin layers.

Can you please try to cut a few layers of vinyl, leather or several layers of fabric and see how it works. One thing that may help would be if you put a stiff interfacing in front and in behind of the faux leather, or put a layer of stiff leather in front.

The cutter doesn't work for all fibres, and that is why it is a free item that we put in complimentary with the press. ai_message: Hi Somnuck,
Thank you for sending that in! I am sorry to hear that you are facing that challenge. Sometimes it is hard to get the serum out of the wand from its thickness and since it is more of a gel rather than liquid. We recommend using a warm towel, or running it under warm water, and wrap the wand in it. Also, try turning it down (brush side towards the floor) and allow gravity to assist you with getting the serum out. Keep twisting until the serum comes out. It takes a while the first time but after that, it should come out easily.
You can also refer to this video if needed: <URL> let us know if this does not work so we can resolve the issue as soon as possible, Somnuck!

[["human_message: HI Adam, 

How often and how and what is the best thing to use to clean the inside of it?  Without using chemicals.

ai_message: Hi there <PERSON>, 

Thank you so much for reaching out with your question about keeping your portable sauna clean. I totally understand the importance of maintaining a healthy and chemical-free environment.

For a gentle and chemical-free cleaning routine, I recommend using a mixture of water and white vinegar. Mix equal parts of water and white vinegar in a spray bottle, and lightly spritz the interior surfaces of your portable sauna. Then, wipe it down with a soft, non-abrasive cloth.

Remember to allow the sauna to dry thoroughly after cleaning to prevent any potential moisture-related issues. Feel free to repeat this process regularly to keep your portable sauna fresh and welcoming.

If you have any more questions or if there's anything else I can help you with, just let me know! 🌟"], ["human_message: You received a new message from your online store's contact form. 
Country Code: <LOCATION> Name 1: <PERSON> Email: <EMAIL_ADDRESS> Message: Hey team, I got my sauna and it works great, I just had a question about cleaning. How do you guys recommend cleaning and with what products are okay to use when cleaning?

ai_message: Hello,

Thanks for reaching us. 

Certainly! Cleaning a portable sauna requires a gentle approach to avoid any damage or shrinkage. Here are the best practices:

Interior <NRP> each use, wipe down the interior surfaces with a clean, damp cloth to remove sweat and residue.
Avoid using harsh chemicals or strong cleaning agents, as they may damage the material.
Let the sauna air dry with the zippers open to allow proper ventilation.

Exterior Cleaning:

Use a mild soap or a mixture of mild soap and water to clean the exterior.
Gently wipe the surface with a soft cloth or sponge.
Do not use abrasive cleaners, as they can scratch or damage the material.

Zippers:

Keep the zippers clean by wiping them with a damp cloth.
Lubricate the zipper occasionally with a silicone-based lubricant to ensure smooth operation.

Avoid Machine Washing:

Portable saunas are typically not suitable for machine washing.
Avoid submerging the sauna in water, as this can lead to shrinkage and damage.

Regular Maintenance:

Check the sauna regularly for any signs of wear, loose seams, or damaged zippers.
Address any issues promptly to prevent further <PERSON> not in use, store the portable sauna in a cool, dry place.
Ensure it is completely dry before folding and storing to prevent mold or mildew.
Remember, the key is to use mild cleaning agents and gentle wiping to maintain the integrity of the portable sauna. 

Kind Regards,
Ali."]]

So let's keep this simple. Please just refund me. The refund policy is within <DATE_TIME> of receiving the product and my order hasn't shipped yet, so please just cancel and refund. And if you can offer me something that assures I don't have to wait <DATE_TIME> or more when I can literally order things off Amazon that will arrive <DATE_TIME>, I would love to be able to use the Saintmaker rather than the other planning solutions I have tried. But it's an uphill struggle for me to integrate something like a planner into my life, and having to detransition from using one for <DATE_TIME> to not having it anymore is really disruptive. I'm willing to commit to an <DATE_TIME> subscription when your company starts reflecting the virtues of reliability, foresight, planning and logistics management that I was trying to use your product to cultivate. As it stands, I have no idea when my planners would have come, and if I missed the fine print, it's because these sorts of attentive, responsible virtues that would have clued me into "oh, maybe if I make this order now, I will have to do something else for <DATE_TIME> until they come" were precisely the reason I wanted something like this in the first place. Ugh. Please just refund me, and if it's clearly promised on your website that I can actually start an <DATE_TIME> subscription AND get shipped a four-pack of journals in a quicker turnaround, than <DATE_TIME>, I will consider it then, because I think the product quality is excellent. But if this is just a case of you got badly backloaded by orders over <DATE_TIME>, why on earth did you encourage this kind of backloading by having <DATE_TIME> sales? Why are you trying to sell more than you have the means to actually fulfill in any kind of reasonable amount of time? Refund, please, and quickly too, because I do have some onerous bills that need to be paid very soon.

<PERSON>: Hi <PERSON>,
I understand that there was a mix-up with your purchase and you didn't receive all of the items that you ordered. I know how frustrating it can be to receive an incomplete order, so I'm very sorry for the inconvenience and disappointment this has caused.
As a way of making it up to you, we'd like to offer you either a replacement or a refund for your missing item. Please let me know which solution you would prefer and I can work on getting this all sorted out for you.
If you still have the packing slip, can you please send us a picture of it? Please include the signature at the bottom so our fulfillment facility can provide feedback to the quality control team member who signed off on your package.
I hope that one of the solutions above will help to make up for this experience. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you have any further questions or concerns. We're always here and happy to help.

The ring on the charm and the ring on the chain are basically the same size. This is the second time I've bought a necklace with double charms from y'all and the ring on the charm and the charm itself 
is <IN_PAN> smaller than the previous one (I used my own chain for my previous charm). 

I <IN_PAN> some people have multiple pets and have different charms for each of them\<US_DRIVER_LICENSE> but the information on your website should be more clear if the charm isn't going to be removable. I love my dog, I don't need her twice on one necklace.

Pupring Customer Care"]]

"Carmen" is an exquisite fragrance, a symphony of contrasts
where the opulence of exotic spices dances with the richness
of woodland enchantments. This scent is a masterfully
composed tapestry, beckoning you on a journey of sensory
allure that begins with a bold declaration of seductive
fruitiness, meanders through a landscape of intoxicating
florals and spices, and culminates in a resonant embrace of
deep, woody warmth.

💫 Top Note: Black Cherry Rhapsody Carmen opens with a
captivating overture of Black Cherry, a melody of dark,
luscious fruitiness that enwraps you in its voluptuous
charm. This initial encounter is both tantalizing and
inviting, blending the cherry's deep sweetness with a subtle
hint of tartness, creating an atmosphere of mystique and
anticipation.

💫 Heart Note: Spiced Floral Elegance At its heart, <PERSON>
unfurls a tapestry of exotic spices and delicate florals.
The warmth of <PERSON> and the luxurious allure of Saffron
interweave, forming an enchanting spice-laden breeze. This
spicy infusion is softened by the tender touch of
Heliotrope, a floral whisper that adds a creamy, almond-like
sweetness, balancing the intensity of the spices with its
gentle caress.

💫 Base: Woodland Resonance In its final act, <PERSON> settles
into a rich, woody base. The comforting essence of Fir
Balsam melds seamlessly with the noble strength of Cedar,
evoking the serene depth of ancient forests. This woody
foundation is elevated by the sophisticated touch of
Ambergris, adding a refined, almost marine-like elegance
that lingers on the skin, a testament to the fragrance's
enduring charm.

💫 For the Bold and the Beautiful Carmen is a fragrance for
the bold, for those who embrace the complexities of life
with passion and elegance. It is a scent that speaks to the
fearless heart, to the individual who is captivated by the
dance of contrasts, finding beauty in the blend of darkness
and light, spice and sweetness, strength and softness. With
its rich, multifaceted character, <PERSON> is more than a
fragrance; it is a declaration of confidence, a celebration
of sophistication.

If your hearing aids are not charging, it may be time to clean them. To do this, you will want the hearing aids, charger, cleaning brush and an alcohol swab. 
First, clean your hearing aids with the small brush, getting inside both the receiver (the side that goes into the ear canal) and the <IN_PAN> (the side that faces out of the ear). Move onto the charger and clean out both charging ports with the brush to break up any dirt or debris. 
Now that you have brushed away excess dirt, use the alcohol swab to clean the golden circular charging adapters on the hearing aid as well as the golden circular adapters within the charging ports of the charging dock. Now you will want to charge the hearing aids for <DATE_TIME> or until charged.
If these steps are not helpful, please reach back out to us!

ai_message: Hi <PERSON>! 
Thanks for reaching out! 
I am unable to see your cart, so I am not sure exactly which items you have added.    Our prices had to have a slight increase <DATE_TIME> due to cost of business <IN_PAN>, but only by a few cents, and only on a few items - we wanted to keep it a low impact to our customers. 
I am thinking the wrist strap, depending on which one you have in your cart is contributing to the total.    I am sorry if the total of your cart will not work for you, we do try our best to keep <IN_PAN>.

ai_message: Hi <PERSON>, <PERSON> here! 
I just want to add, <PERSON>, that if you are getting bumped up to parcel rates, the minimum parcel rate to <LOCATION> from <LOCATION> has increased a lot due to fuel <IN_PAN> put on by Canada Post. There has been an increase in shipping that is not added by us. Our shipping rates come direct from our website <IN_PAN> to the Canada Post site, and we do get a <IN_PAN> discount that is passed on to you. 
I know it is hard, it had been difficult for our business to deal with the increased shipping costs as it hurts our sales and upsets our long time customers. Just so you know, you can get a lot in those parcels. The way they rate it is that it is for 300 grams and up, it's not less for small parcels. A lot of our customers are trying to save on shipping during these high fuel <IN_PAN> by filling up the package. So if you add items until the shipping pops up to the next rate, and then take something out until it goes back down, you will have maxed out your shipping.   Sometimes our customers will get 2 or 3 letters instead of parcel! That is much cheaper. Unfortunately, the handle you wanted to order cannot go by letter as the limit is 2 cm thick. 
I hope that helps.  We don't like to think that you may wondering if we are overcharging. I hope that helps. Let me know if you have any more questions. 
Janelle MacKay

human_message: Hi Janelle,

I know Canada Post have increased their rates.  I tried breaking things down so they could ship cheaper\<URL>ybe I’ll give it another try and see if I can justify the purchases.

Thanks for trying to help. You guys are so good to deal with, I hate to start shopping around for product again\<US_DRIVER_LICENSE>..

Regards,
Deb

ai_message: Thank you for your understanding <PERSON>, it has been very frustrating.    We are in constant conversation with Canada Post, and will continue to push them to lower their rates.  It is not fair that is so expensive to ship in our own country. 
There are a few quilt shops in <LOCATION> that carry our products, hopefully if all else fails you may be able to find some <PERSON> hardware locally.

human_message: Hi <PERSON> some reason when I went back to recheck my cart, the shipping reduced to $4.44! <PERSON>!!  I’m going ahead with <PERSON> very happy to do.  Love dealing with you guys.

Deb"], ["human_message: Have any other questions?

ai_message: Hello <PERSON>, <PERSON> is still there, but is only offered if the cart is light enough in weight. There is a weight limit on Oversize letter and they can't be thicker than 2 cm. Try taking some items out of cart and splitting it into 2 letters instead of one parcel. 
Unfortunately, Canada Post rates are high right now for parcels and we get a 40% discount. Our rates are connected to Canada Post in checkout so those are rates direct from them with our CP account! 
I hope that helps!
Janelle

ai_message: In addition to my other email, I see in your abandoned checkout that you have a zipper in the cart. The zippers automatically cancel out the letter option because they can't be shipped under 2 cm by the time they are folded up. Sadly, if you are to order zippers you need parcel. You can get quite a lot in a parcel, actually, so if you order a few zippers, fabric etc, and maybe more hardware to last a bit longer, the shipping can be more cost effective. I am not trying to upsell you, but just let you know what our other customers are doing, since shipping is so high right now.

I have received my order #<US_DRIVER_LICENSE> and glad that the items were in an envelope as requested. I always appreciate your quick service and quality products.
Just wondering if the shipping cost was reduced and a refund to reflect this will be <PERSON>: Hello <PERSON>! 
Good to hear from you! 
The weight of the package was well over the letter mail cutoff for Canada Post. Shipping the letter in an envelope did not take it down to a Letter rate, as it was still the weight of a parcel. 
In the future, I think it would be best if you tried smaller orders, then you will be actually offered Letter mail at checkout, if it is light enough weight. You can place 2 or even 3 orders, and select letter mail for each and that may make shipping much less for you. 
I hope that helps! 
Janelle MacKay

[["human_message: Hi there,

The form '1 YEAR WARRANTY CLAIM' just has a new <IN_PAN> in your store <URL>.

SUBMISSION DETAIL

*First Name : Joseph
  *Last Name : Edwards
  *Email : <EMAIL_ADDRESS>
  *Order Number : 7274
  *Order Date : <DATE_TIME>  *Phone Number : <PHONE_NUMBER>
  *Product Model : Luxium Crusader - Durable Smart Watch
  *Reason for claim : Product defect
  *Desired Outcome : Exchange
  *Describe the issue in detail : Watch stopped charging <DATE_TIME> after i received it and i sent an email about it that was never answered or maybe not received. I want my watch replaced as it has been long enough
  *File Upload :  Image

You can also go to the app admin page(Forms->Submissions) to check submission details.

All the best,
Notification @Pifyapp

ai_message: Hello Joseph!
Your claim has been reviewed by our team and has been approved. A return label has been sent to the email used to originally create the order. The label is prepaid by Luxium. This shipment will be handled by the USPS. Follow the below instructions to ensure a successful exchange process.
Print out the prepaid label sent to your email and securely attach it to a plastic envelope and/or bag that is suitable for shipping the items included in the return. Seal the items being returned to ensure they will accepted by the USPS.Drop off the return package at your local USPS office. This can be done at any self serve package drop-off.Once the item is shipped and received by USPS (3-5 business days), a replacement order will be issued.
Please note that no postage will need to be paid by the customer.
Once again, we are very sorry that your Luxium experience had to result in an exchange, but we hope your new watch serves you better!"]]

ai_message: Hello <PERSON>, <PERSON> is still there, but is only offered if the cart is light enough in weight. There is a weight limit on Oversize letter and they can't be thicker than 2 cm. Try taking some items out of cart and splitting it into 2 letters instead of one parcel. 
Unfortunately, Canada Post rates are high right now for parcels and we get a 40% discount. Our rates are connected to Canada Post in checkout so those are rates direct from them with our CP account! 
I hope that helps!
Janelle

ai_message: In addition to my other email, I see in your abandoned checkout that you have a zipper in the cart. The zippers automatically cancel out the letter option because they can't be shipped under 2 cm by the time they are folded up. Sadly, if you are to order zippers you need parcel. You can get quite a lot in a parcel, actually, so if you order a few zippers, fabric etc, and maybe more hardware to last a bit longer, the shipping can be more cost effective. I am not trying to upsell you, but just let you know what our other customers are doing, since shipping is so high right now.

ai_message: Hi Amy,

As requested, your Probiotic Chew subscription has been canceled immediately. Moving forward, you will no longer be charged for future orders.

Size/fit -

Feedback -

human_message: I occasionally dribble wee but dont want to spend money on pads 24/7

ai_message: Hi  ,
Thanks for reaching out, and great question! 
Thinx and Thinx for All Leaks are absorbent, reusable underwear that provides a more sustainable alternative to <IN_PAN> products. They're available in ranging absorbencies and discreet designs that look and feel like regular underwear. Just wear, wash, and reuse them again and again. Each pair features our signature, <IN_PAN> built-in <IN_PAN> that absorbs leaks, controls odors, and wicks away moisture \<US_DRIVER_LICENSE> so you can stay fresh and dry no matter what. 
That said, there are a few differences between the brands. Thinx is period-absorbing underwear, while we designed Thinx for All Leaks specifically to absorb light bladder leaks. While the three-layer tech that makes each of these products absorbent is very similar, the specific makeup and composition of the layers differ slightly between the brands to account for the differences in pH and viscosity between period flow and bladder leaks.
Thinx for All Leaks absorbent styles hold up to 100 mL for the best protection against light bladder leaks, while Thinx period underwear holds up to 5 tampons' worth of menstrual flow. For more information about our brands, check out<URL> hope this helps!"]]

Agent's Message: If you are experiencing feedback/whistling from your hearing aids, don't worry, this is a normal <IN_PAN> when inserting them. I suggest you gently press the hearing aid deeper into your ear canal until this feedback stops. The <IN_PAN> is the cause of this sound, and once you have adjusted the hearing aid to the correct position, it should go away!
Also,
1) Feedback upon insertion is expected. It's normal to occur with in-ear devices. The main thing is that the feedback should only happen when getting the device inserted, and once it's inserted properly, there should be minimal to zero feedback.
2) Volume will affect feedback during insertion. Set the volume to level 1 before inserting to avoid it <IN_PAN>. Just hold the units close to your ears, click the buttons to set volume to live 1, and then insert them.
3) It's hard to avoid touching the <IN_PAN> when grabbing the device, and the closer your hand is to the mic, the more likely it is to cause feedback. So the best way to insert the device is by holding it by the pull wire, which is the farthest point away from the unit. Hold the unit by the pull wire, and let your fingers gently support the unit from the back, which is also the complete opposite side of the mic.
